mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD ( BOARD_NO, BOARD_TYPE_CODE, TITLE, CONTENT, MAJOR_YN, MAJOR_PERIOD_DATE, REG_DATETIME, REG_ID ) VALUES ( #{board_no}, #{board_type_code}, #{title}, #{content}, #{major_yn, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{major_period_date, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{reg_id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, MAJOR_YN = #{major_yn jdbcType=TINYINT}, MAJOR_PERIOD_DATE = #{major_period_date jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPD_DATETIME = #{upd_datetime} WHERE BOARD_NO = #{board_no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
